description.value:
You use your medical training to ameliorate sickness or assuage fears.

When you use Medicine to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Administer First Aid], instead of Stabilizing a character or Stopping Bleeding, you can reduce an ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened] condition by 2, or remove either of those conditions entirely on a critical success. You can remove only one condition at a time.

The DC for the Medicine check is usually the DC of the effect that caused the condition.
